context: Figma launched in 2015 as a browser-based collaborative design tool. The company pioneered real-time collaboration in design, challenging established desktop tools like Sketch and Adobe.

competitors.name: Sketch
competitors.notes: Dominant Mac design tool that Figma aimed to disrupt with browser-based collaboration

competitors.name: Adobe Illustrator
competitors.notes: Industry standard vector design tool from Adobe Creative Cloud

competitors.name: Adobe Photoshop
competitors.notes: Dominant image editing and design tool

competitors.name: InVision
competitors.notes: Prototyping and collaboration platform for designers

competitors.name: Axure
competitors.notes: Wireframing and prototyping tool for UX designers

competitors.name: UXPin
competitors.notes: Design and prototyping tool with collaboration features
